```{r}
library(simulatetimeseries)
```

# 1 - Stationary Series

```{r, fig.width = 7.5}
set.seed(123)
x <- rnorm(1000)
par(mfrow = c(1, 2))
plot(x, type = "l")
plot(diff(x), type = "l")
print(martingale_test(x))
```

# 2 - Brownian Motion

```{r, fig.width = 7.5}
set.seed(123)
x <- cumsum(rnorm(1000))
par(mfrow = c(1, 2))
plot(x, type = "l")
plot(diff(x), type = "l")
print(martingale_test(x))
```

# 3 - Random Walk with Drift

```{r, fig.width = 7.5}
set.seed(123)
x <- cumsum(rnorm(1000)) + seq_len(1000)
par(mfrow = c(1, 2))
plot(x, type = "l")
plot(diff(x), type = "l")
print(martingale_test(x))
```
